overview: Mr. Allin is a widely regarded executive in the consulting and technology industries. Before helping to found Textura, he was COO & CFO of PricewaterhouseCoopers’ Global Consulting Practice, a $6B business. He was also the Global Relationship Partner for General Motors. Prior to PricewaterhouseCoopers, Mr. Allin was President/CFO/Treasurer of Moore Business Forms North America, a Fortune 500 company. Mr. Allin has had great success throughout his career in establishing new customer relationships, hiring top-performing individuals and creating customer-oriented organizations that have consistently grown faster than competitors. Mr. Allin has negotiated numerous acquisitions as well as strategic and business alliances.
